author: Zack Budryk
title: 200 businesses cited for not following Kansas City's stay-at-home order
description: Kansas City Mayor Quinton Lucas (D) announced Monday that 200 businesses have been issued citations for failing to comply with a stay-at-home order.Lucas, who last week ordered residents to remain in their homes ex...
content:
Kansas City Mayor Quinton Lucas (D) announced Monday that 200 businesses have been issued citations for failing to comply with a stay-at-home order.
Lucas, who last week ordered residents to remain in their homes except for essential activities or to go to w… [+1352 chars]
